messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near April Outpost Alpha, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: no zombies in this good christan centcom

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Power Systems Nominal

Power has been restored to April Outpost Alpha. We apologize for the inconvenience.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Captain's Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

Meteors have been detected on collision course with the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Biohazard Alert

Confirmed outbreak of level 7 viral biohazard aboard April Outpost Alpha. All personnel must contain the outbreak.
